svg.text: RaddStudio is a design and development firm that brings together the advantages of todays world of technology to bring your software, web, and ideas to reality for you and your businesses. Our experienced network of professionals design, develop, and implement your web and system solutions with you to ensure that our product meets the needs of your businesses..

script:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" version="1.1" type="image/svg+xml" class="<@= css @>" height="<@= height @>" width="<@= width @>" viewBox="<@= viewbox @>"<@= options @>>
<%= render 'shared/definitions' %>
<rect x="0" y="0" height="<@= height @>" width="<@= width @>" />

script.svg: <g class='<@= name @> stage-data' transform='<@= transform @>' <@= options @>>

svg.g: <rect class="base" x="<@= x @>" y="<@= y @>" height="<@= height @>" width="<@= width @>" /> <line class="left" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="<@= height @>" /> <line class="right" x1="<@= width-3 @>" y1="0" x2="<@= width-3 @>" y2="<@= height @>" />
